snippet.title: Scrap Galaxy - Multiplayer Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now! Out 1st December at http://store.steampowered.com/app/723110/Scrap_Galaxy/

Scrap Galaxy is a local build-and-destroy deathmatch game for up to 4 players. It is a 2D top-down shooter taking place out in space in a galactic junkyard. In this setting, the players are trying to survive by constructing space ships. 

Catalope Games is a small studio in Sweden dedicated to cute and fun games. Follow us here:
http://www.catalopegames.com/
https://twitter.com/CatalopeGames
https://www.facebook.com/CatalopeGames/
